org.jepria.versionizer.ui

Interface UserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLUI

    public interface UserInterface
    Simple, low-level (uses primitive types for communication) user interface

      • optOverviewAutoGenerate

        int optOverviewAutoGenerate(java.lang.String overviewPath)
        When overview.html not found in the module, ask whether to auto-generate overview file, create manually or skip the module
        Parameters:
        overviewPath - suggested path for generating/creating missing overview file
        Returns:
        1: auto-generate; 2: user creates overview file manually; else: skip the module

      • reqGenerateOverviewManually

        void reqGenerateOverviewManually()
        Wait till the user creates the overview file manually

      • optReleaseNotesBlockManualCreate

        int optReleaseNotesBlockManualCreate(java.lang.String overviewPath)
        When no releaseNotes block found in the overview file, ask whether to create it manually or to skip writing release notes for the module
        Parameters:
        overviewPath -
        Returns:
        1: user creates releaseNotes block manually; else: skip writing release notes for the module

      • reqReleaseNotesBlockManualCreate

        void reqReleaseNotesBlockManualCreate(java.lang.String overviewPath)
        Request create Release Notes Block manually in the overview file (just a block, with no content)

      • msgReleaseNotesExist

        void msgReleaseNotesExist(java.lang.String targetVersion,

      • optReleaseNotesExistUpdate

        int optReleaseNotesExistUpdate(java.lang.String targetVersion,
                               java.lang.String overviewPath)
        When release notes for the target version already exist in the overview file, ask whether to auto-update existing release notes, to update them manually or to skip writing release notes for the module
        Parameters:
        targetVersion -
        overviewPath -
        Returns:
        1: auto-update existing release notes for the target version; 2: user writes release notes manually; else: skip writing release notes for the module

      • reqReleaseNotesExistWriteManually
